name: Thumb Thrasher
description: Tap! TAP! TAAAAAP! Make sure this poor baby bird doesn't fall! And we have monkeys! Monkeys? Yes monkeys hanging from balloons. Oh how pestering they can be as they give you wet willies and jump on your head. Every bird gets hungry when they're flying, right? Eat some delicious burgers along the way. But be careful we all know too much burgers isn’t the best. How much can your thumbs take?!?... Wimpy, Easy, or EXTREMELY HARD mode! Compare scores with your friends and see who has the strongest thumbs!
